alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 6:33PM EDT until September 02 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Houghton County in western Upper Michigan... Northwestern Baraga County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 632 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nisula, or 11 miles west of Baraga, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Baraga around 650 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include L`anse and Keweenaw Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
